Name: Team Size Limit
Description: Teams must have at least 3 and at most 9 members

Name: Employee Availability
Description: Employees assigned to tasks must be available during the sprint

Name: Skill Match for Tasks
Description: Assigned employees must have required skills for the tasks

Name: Sprint Duration
Description: Sprints must last exactly between 1 to 4 weeks

Name: Product Backlog Status
Description: Product Backlog must be in active status to assign features

Name: Task Status for Sprint Backlog
Description: Only tasks with status 'Ready' or 'In Progress' can be in Sprint Backlog

Name: Max Workload per Employee
Description: No employee should be assigned more than 40 effort points per sprint

Name: Feature Priority Order
Description: Features in Product Backlog should follow priority order

Name: Scrum Master Support
Description: Every team must be supported by exactly one Scrum Master

Name: User Story Acceptance Criteria
Description: User stories must have defined acceptance criteria before sprint assignment
